div.head: 外感之濕
div.div: moisture affecting the body from outside

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: moisture affecting the body from outside

sense.def: Abbreviated Designation wai shi 外濕 , external moisture. Etiological Agent. of moisture evil entering the human body from outside. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Shi ji 十劑 , zao ji 燥劑 , drying preparations: 外感之濕，雨露嵐霧地氣水濕，襲於皮肉 筋骨經絡之間 , “[In the case of] moisture affecting the body from outside , rain, dew, mountain haze and fog, qi of the earth, as well as water and moisture have attacked and entered skin, flesh, sinews, bones, conduits and network vessels”.
